title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.30 - Statement of issues
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.30 - Statement of issues

State Regulations
(a) At least 10 days prior to the trial
of the issues joined in any proceeding, except where an order framing issues
has theretofore been made, the petitioner shall file with the court a
statement, in writing, of the nature of such issues, the party who holds the
affirmative as to each issue, and the objections, if any, which the petitioner
concedes to be well taken or which may have been withdrawn. (b) In accounting proceedings, an additional notation shall be included in the statement as to any
modifications of the account to which the parties consent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
207.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
